p: Screening criteria on the basis of adjusted P < 0.05 and |log 2FC| > 1.0, DEGs were screened between LMP and EOC samples in GSE27651, GSE57477, and GSE9899. Then, the DEGs were visualized as volcano plots (Fig. 1a-c). Subsequently, 81 overlapping up-regulated genes and 153 down-regulated genes (Fig. 1d-e) were identified using Venny online tool.
